description: Rename coderef/working/{feature}/ to coderef/work-order/{feature}/ to better reflect that folders contain workorder artifacts (plan.json, communication.json, etc.) not general work-in-progress
rationale: 'working' is ambiguous - 'work-order' clearly indicates these folders contain workorder artifacts like plan.json, communication.json, context.json, DELIVERABLES.md
migration_strategy: Audit all references to coderef/working/ across all projects
Update CLAUDE.md in assistant and all project templates
Rename directories via git mv (preserve history)
benefits: Clearer naming: work-order indicates structured workorder artifacts
note: This is more specific than STUB-047 - focuses on the folder name itself, not the entire directory structure
